m_szDocTitle: METHODS, APPARATUS AND SYSTEMS FOR MANAGING ENERGY ASSETS - Viridity Energy, Inc.
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- METHODS, APPARATUS AND SYSTEMS FOR MANAGING ENERGY ASSETS United States Patent Application 20120296482 Kind                 Code: A1 Abstract: The apparatuses and methods herein facilitate generation of energy-related revenue for an energy customer of an electricity supplier, for a system that includes an energy storage asset. The apparatuses and methods herein can be used to generate operating schedules for a controller of the energy storage asset. When implemented, the generated operating schedules facilitates derivation of the energy-related revenue, over a
